alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 4:57PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Las Animas County through 545 PM MDT... At 457 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Model to 8 miles west of Trinchera. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Trinchera around 505 PM MDT. Branson around 515 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft
